H0.text: Flemish is almost identical in form to which other language . German

H1.text: Flemish is almost identical in form to which other language . Frisian

H2.text: Flemish is almost identical in form to which other language . Afrikaans

H3.text: Flemish is almost identical in form to which other language . DUTCH

A4.text: Flemish (Vlaams [vlaÀêms] ) is a Low Franconian dialect cluster of the Dutch language.

A5.text: Standard Dutch words can have a completely different meaning in Flemish or imply different context, comparable to the differences between the British and North American variants of English.

A6.text: The Nederlandse Taalunie is a Dutch language union.

A7.text: K-Dutch CLARIN Knowledge Centre for Dutch is hosted by the Instituut voor de Nederlandse Taal.
